name: Wilbur's Wandering Mind
description:
Use the WASD or the arrow keys to move around Wilbur's mind and push against the sides of the brain to make him move around.

Thoughts will float around Wilbur's brain and make him move in random directions. Try not to collect too many of them!

Try to keep control over Wilbur as you collect stars and keep him from falling into the lava.
